Soon enough, the new vixen was saluting her while Fiona started asking a question- Why did she say yes? The new vixen smiled as she answered.

And thanks to a bit of thinking else where, I wanted to be a woman. Why else would I have built something that turned me into a vixen with a body like yours?"

Fiona was flattered, but a bit suspicious to be honest- If she wanted to be female, why would she wait until now? Fiona soon checked the inventions she had swiped, and they seemed tailor-made for exactly the purpose she was aiming for... "M-Mistress... Wh-why am I being restrained? O-Oh, jeez... D-Did I goof up again? P-Please tell me I didn't mess anything up, Mistress..."

And both Fiona and Melissa were relishing just what had become of her... As Melissa draped a lab coat over Aqua, Nicole soon questioned just what they would be doing for their next target... Melissa on the other hand was preparing something rather large- A silver aircraft of some sort with a large interior towards the middle. Aqua gulped while Melissa explained.

"This is meant to be an improvement on the spaceship from back during the Black Arms invasion. Thing is, it was meant to be regular transport. Unfortunately, a certain blue jackwad said no because he wanted to just run run run, even when it wasn't an emergency. It's rather cushy inside because I can appreciate the finer things in life."

The group soon went inside, and true to what Melissa said, it was rather extravagant. While Aqua sat in a corner, Fiona jumped down and chuckled.

Instead, we need to take advantage of what wasn't there for thousands of years- Carnival Night and Launch Base."

Aqua gulped and tilted her head, questioning Flying Battery before apologizing again. Melissa was gentle in explaining that the base had crashed into the ocean after it had been... Conquered. Now, they just had to relax for now as Nicole started luring the "new porcupine on the block, with the buff chest" as one rap that Melissa had heard a while back based on Knuckles... What kind of thing was that, anyway? Regardless, they could kick back and wait for the time being and wait for Nicole to report. Soon enough, Nicole reported.

"Mistress I have captured..."

Fiona shrugged and nodded- It was definitely better to have someone with a brain rather than a gullible punch-happy buffoon as what most might characterize the guardian of the Echidna. She cracked her once-namesakes and bowed.

Fiona and Melissa looked at each other before admitting that such an idea was a relatively good idea- Even if it meant that Ruby would be out of action, just the idea of someone using the Master Emerald against them was definitely a bad idea, not to mention the fact that, to some degree, Angel Island in and of itself could be construed as some sort of weapon the moment the Master Emerald left it just because of the fact that it was quite large, and the impact, on land or sea, would definitely be a dangerous situation. As such, it was deemed that defending the Master Emerald would be a reasonable idea. But for now...

"Probably best to just dump them in a hole somewhere in the ocean rather than let some whack job get their hands on it... Sure, using them would be interesting, but Aqua would be the only one to actually be able to tap into them at best, and if we did use them, they'd probably scatter... Like they tend to do, again and again and again... Plus keeping anyone in a Super Form means Rings- Lots and lots of rings... Maybe we could leave them at Angel Island or something, make them the defenders of the Emeralds or something..."

Melissa considered which of those possibilities would be a good idea given the existence of radars. Sure, digging a hole and leaving them to be forgotten would be a good idea given they might end up embedded within the rocks... But having active defenders would mean that there was less of a chance of some kid finding them and messing the whole "leaving them to be forgotten" thing up... From the cataclysm on, however, it was known only as an alternate place- Hidden Palace would be the traditional home given the crystals there as well as the prophetic carvings that would imply a certain mustachioed scientist and a golden being going at each other. But of course, that was the past. First, they would start preparing something a bit more high-tech. Machines with a visual motif based on both Melissa's memories and the carvings across the island. Ruby on the other hand had a curious idea- Salvaging from Launch Base to bolster the tech in both sets of security systems. Fiona was a bit apprehensive given who made it... But it was going to serve a far better purpose...

Things as she slept. In the meantime, the group had continued, Shade included among the vixens, and they waited for the time being. Nicole made contact again, and Fiona responded.

Fiona grinned as Sally was lead inside, looking far more like sort of incredibly busty mindless babe.

"Like, the mean lady is saying that you're a total jerk, and that you should be burning in some h place or something weird like that- Personally I'd rather be your number one Bimbo!"

Fiona grinned. She liked the sound of that coming from Sally's lips. It was just so satisfying... She was just so close to forcing the squirrel under her heel... But there was still something to do- She wasn't a vixen just like the others yet. After all, she deserved one little gift, and becoming a vixen like her would be the only thing Sally would be getting...

Sally pulled her way in, yet made it obvious that she wanted a lot more skin showing as she tore at bits and pieces of the uniform, mainly the bottom just so she could show off her soon to be embellished figure. Fiona soon rolled her eyes and headed towards a console, where Nicole was doing... Something. She had no idea what, but Nicole was definitely working. Fiona soon begged the obvious question.

"... What are you doing?"

Nicole answered, explaining that she was looking into ARK records to see if there was a means of turning Shadow the Hedgehog into Shadow the Vixen, while retaining the things that made the 50-year old the Ultimate Lifeform he was, and that she was going to be. Fiona chuckled, amused at just how much Nicole was into Shadow when she was expecting Rouge to do that sort of intensive research.

Melissa then came up to Fiona.

"Uh..Mistress I was wondering what is our end goal with this?"asked Melissa.

"End goal?"asked FIona."I haven't thought of that myself. Well first we turn everyone into vixens then.."

112311111112211112111211211111211111111.content:
Fiona grinned and grasped onto Melissa's shoulder.

"Just sit back and imagine- There's nothing but vixens, living in harmony with the world... We've gotten rid of all disease, and we've gotten over that tiny little reproduction issue with some legitimate science... And we're the queens, ruling over this paradise... No need for the Chaos Emeralds... No need to get nuts over supernatural gems... We can study things in peace, we don't need to worry about idiots trying to take over the world just because of some nonsense... And we have our personal harem. And then there's what remains of the old fools- Eggman and Sally, turned into our personal Bimbos... How does that sound, my lovely partner?"

Melissa drooled before blinking.

"Wait, Eggman? We took care of Sally, but what are we going to do about Eggman? Is he going to be our newest target, or would that be our final goal after we've dealt with all of the animals? Because he's bound to do something about our search for the Chaos Emeralds..."

Anyway, just try and keep things reserved- We can surprise them while they're... Gardening or something like that, then we can just explain it to them- I don't want anything changed about Cream. Just because she'll be older doesn't mean she'll be dropping any sort of education. As for Vanilla... Well, let's just say she's had some wild times before she became a mother. So she'll be back to being a dominatrix when she's not being, well, a mother for her kids."

Melissa was a bit confused by what was going on, but... In a way, it was her being thoughtful for once, acknowledging just how innocent the girl was despite what was going on. Still, they had a bit of a question given they brought up Cream and Vanilla- Would they go after the two rabbits, or would they perhaps try someone else to turn?

Melissa nodded and sped off. Fiona was pleased with her- She was just so loyal, yet she always managed to keep her head on her shoulders. She would definitely be the right choice for a ruler. Still, her mind ran towards a particular white bat- Likely the next target after the two rabbits. After all, she tended to be privy to government secrets as well as the one person who could keep up with Aqua... Maybe- She never did know if that so-called Ultimate Lifeform could keep up with the blue blunder without those shoes of his... It was something that never seemed to be answered. But that could be ascertained another time. Soon enough, Melissa returned, satisfied, and the two headed out, intent on capturing themselves a pair of rabbits, although they had to stay quiet for the time being- After all, people were starting to notice certain individuals disappearing... Fiona gulped. She was going to change a child. Even she had limits, and changing a child was getting pretty close. Still, such things would have to wait for the sake of her goals. She sighed and looked at Melissa, who seemed to understand her pain at the moment. It was nice to have a friend like her... Still, she would have to figure out something of a decision- Whether she would let Vanilla take care of her daughter, aging her up and turning her into a fellow vixen... Or she could simply bite the bullet and do both of those things herself. Still, it was something she had to agonize about on her own- As the leader, she had to think about which would leave less of an impact on her... She would probably have to do this to others, not just the likes of Cream. As such, she had to make a decision here and now.

Melissa explains what is going on then mind controls her.

"How about right after our wedding?" Nicole suggested, forming a ring with her nanites, and sliding it onto Sally's finger.

"Oh, Nicole, yes!" Sally gasped.

And so, Fiona Fox, who had set out to turn everyone in the world into a sexy vixen like herself, made one mistake, and ended up becoming Princess Fiona Nicolette Lynx-Acorn, Nicole and Sally's adopted daughter. She was brought up to be a prim and proper princess, much unlike her mother, and never remembered her old life. Tiffany, meanwhile, matured, losing much of her girliness as she grew, and becoming Fiona's protector, as well as her lover, under Nicole's tutelage. Nicole turned Sonic into a blue vixen named Sapphire Prower, Tiffany's cool older sister, and Nicole and Sally's occasional sex toy, not only preserving the former brother dynamic, but also saving Sonic from Amy, and giving him his chance with Sally, albeit in a more risque way.

13.content:
"Heheh, look at poor little Tails." Fiona thought as she saw Tails head for his bed. "I wonder what new toys you have for me today?" Fiona moved away from the window and silently walked by the house. Fiona knew that the best way to enter a house unnoticed was to go through the back door. Which is stupid because this day and age, the back door is the most guarded. Fiona slipped around the corner and grab the door handle. Now before she opens that door, lets talk a bit on what happens around this world.

         Tails (Not counting Eggman) is undoubtedly the smartest person in the world. He can build anything. While machines or other dimension. Lately there has been a rumor going around that after Tails went through puberty, he focuses on all his research on the body. He started to spend time with his friends less and less. The one's who take the time to still visit him are Sonic, Amy, and Mina. Sonic still goes on adventures and Amy became a hitman. ...Strangely the right job for Amy. Mina still sings but for some reason visits Tails.

         Fiona could care less for Tails's social life. There is an invention of his she needs for her plans is some where in his house and now is the prefect time when his friends, especial Amy, isn't around. Fiona grinned as she recalled her plans for what she was about to do. And this has nothing to do with Scourge.

         Unknowingly knowing about the traps Tails placed in order to catch Fiona herself on the other side of the door, Fiona open the door and step onto Tails trap. This meeting will help to farther his own plans too.

         Now, will you please choose the method in which Tails will or not trap her with?

"You thought I would make a device like that and leave it lying around if it was permanent?" Tails asked. "I suppose this highlights why we would have succeeded if you let me be in charge, but you were doomed to failure without me. You didn't plan ahead. I was intending on modifying the devices to have longer-lasting effects, but you foiled that little idea quickly enough by 'breaking' me. You didn't know your targets well enough, myself included. No clue as to whether they might have backup plans... or a helping hand or two."

13321111112222121112111111112112.content:
Hypon felt a pair of hands close around his wrists, forcing them behind his back, and locking them together. He looked over his shoulder to see a black and gold robot, slightly taller than him, glaring at him with blue optics.

"Meet Gemerl." Tails grinned, as Fiona rolled over, and watched with interest. "He's my pride and joy. My finest creation. Well, okay, I didn't build him, but I repurposed and reprogrammed him. He's the Ultimate Freedom Fighter, now. And he does my work for me at times. Don't bother resisting. Anything you can do, he can do better. Right now, he;s holding you with strength that he copied from Knuckles, Vector, Shadow, Big, Omega, and Perfect Chaos itself, made even better by servos that were already built to be as strong as Shadow. And since you can;t be brainwashed, he's going to have to dispose of you. Gemerl, teleport him into the vacuum of space, will you. Close enough to the Sun to be pulled in by its gravity."

"Isn't killing against the Freedom Fighter code?" Gemerl asked.

"Well, we have an OC who's completely diverted the plot, let alone hampering it, so it would seem that today is a day for rule-bending." Tails shot back, giving the fourth wall an absolutely merciless kick. "And when you're done, get the buffer generator online. Don't want anyone else warping in here uninvited."

"Roger." Gemerl nodded, teleporting away, and taking Hypon with him.

"Will that even kill him?" Fiona asked, going slowly towards the mind-control beam.

"I don't think so. These OCs seem to have levels of immortality that would make an actual god blush. A bit overpowered if you ask me. No, it'll probably only slow him down. The buffer will keep him away from Mobius for a while, but if he can make it back, Gemerl will rip him apart." Tails replied. "He'll have scanned Hypon, so he will know exactly how to kill him. Imagine it. A machine with all of our strengths, and none of our weaknesses."

The golden fox turned around, pausing his rant, and saw what Fiona was doing.

"Crap." She muttered, pointing the beam at Tails and firing.

(Gemerl, for the record, is the awesome balck and gold robot from Sonic Advance 3. He's also the final boss. And he's really that unkillable. THis is pretty much a challenge. Let's see if we can go one plot thread without it turning into a one-sided story about an overpowered gary-stu, shall we? The title is Fiona's Vixens, not Hypon's Vixens, after all.)

1351112121211211221211112211211222212111.content:
Luckily, Sonic, Sally, and Nicole had explained the situation quite well, and Sally made it clear that they were going to give Fiona a chance, since she seemed both truly repentant, and genuinely in love with Tails. So, for the most part, she received a warm welcome. It was only Amy that still held onto her grudge.

"Heya Fi." Bunnie greeted, slapping the vixen on the back with her organic hand.

"Bonjour, Mademoiselle Fiona." Antoine added.

"Thanks guys. I heard the good news about you two, congrats on the wedding." The vixen replied, hugging her old friends. "Shame I had a lapse in judgement right beforehand, or I would have been all over that."

"We've got plenty o' time to catch uup now, sugah." the cyborg rabbit smiled. "Don't you worry yourself about that stuff anymore. It's in the past."

"Yeah, good to see you had a change of heart, Fiona." Rotor added. "I never thought you were that sort of person. You were too nice beforehand."

"Thank you." Fiona smiled, turning to Amy. "Hi again. Listen, I know we didn't exactly part on good terms... I bertrayed you, you tried to break my face with a hammer, but let's follow Bunnie's example, and put that behind us, okay?"

Amy didn't respond, sending the room spinning into an awkward silence.

"Amy, you can still talk, right?" Fiona prompted.

"I can."

"Then do so."

"Sorry, but I was taught that if you don't have anything nice to say, you say nothing." The hedgehog replied grumpily. Fiona's smile faded, as did everyone else's.

"I'm a tough girl, Amy. I can take it." Fiona coaxed.

"Okay then. How dare you swan in here like you're completely innocent, after what you've done!?"

"Hold on there, Amy." Tails cut in. "How many people did she actually hurt? Just me, Sonic, and Sally. I've obviously forgiven her, and I think Sonic has too."

"Yeah, I was kind of a crummy boyfriend in retrospect. I understand what Fi went through, and I understand my own role in that. I still blame myself for leavin; her behind in the prison camp in the first place. No hard feelings there."

"And I decided to give her the benefit of the doubt, based on what I've seen and understood. Fiona and I didn't really see eye-to-eye before, but Tails is the smartest of all of us, save maybe Nicole, and I trust his judgement."

"And how can we trust him? He's infatuated with her! She could easily manipulate him, and he'd blindly follow her without a second thought."

"Incorrect. Back at home, I decided to give Fiona a test, to see if she really had renounced her old ways. I told her that I was going to revive her old plan to turn everyone into a vixen slave. I wasn't serious, of course, but I wanted to gauge her reaction. Do you want to know what it was?"

"What?"

"She pleaded with me to not go through with it, and to instead settle down with her and one day start a family." Tails replied. "Happy now?"

1412111121221111112111111111121111211112.content:
Nicole chuckled, before breaking down into a laugh.

"Silly Hypon. I'm a computer. This 'body' is made up of thousands of nanites. A mind control beam has no sway on me." She giggled, as another tendril of nanites looped over Hypon's arm and pulled it back into the cocoon, crushing the second device as it did so.

"But Tiffany made an adapter to make it work on AIs!" Fiona shouted.

"An adapter that I only finished after you lost sight of your goal for some guy you hardly know. As such, I never put it on the device." Tiffany said, pulling the adapter out of her pocket. "And now, I never will!"

Tiffany crushed the adapter in her hand, allowing the pieces to fall to the floor.

"No!" Fiona cried out.

"And if you think I'll rebuild it, you have another thing coming. I won't make it by choice, and if you remove my free will, I'll lose all of my smarts. Either way you lose me, the only one who knows how to maintain the devices, or build new ones. Or, if I feel like it, deactivate all of them at long range, or make them fire in reverse! On top of that, what's to say that I can't transform everyone back into their old selves, and hypnotize them into acting like their old selves. Not undoing your power, but overwriting it. The moment you chose to trust another man over your own servant, even after what Scourge did to you, was the moment you lost your little campaign."

1412111121221111112111111111121111211112.content:
Tiffany's eyes glowed brighter, and Hypon's dulled slightly, his fur losing its luster, and his power fading. Tiffany allowed herself a triumphant smile, and dropped him like a sack of potatoes.

"You are nothing compared to me, Hypon. Nothing. I can see into the depths of your character from here. You are the sort that would doom all of reality just to get at Fiona, the sort that would brainwash her if she wasn't interested. I may be a jealous monster, but I know real love, and I can tell that there is none between Fiona and you. Fiona's psyche was damaged by both her time in prison and by Scourge's abuse. She feels the need to be protected, to be sheltered, by a stronger figure. I was working to remove this trait, build Fiona up so that she would become independant of others again, but you ruined that. You brought her back down to being dependant on you, just like she was on Sonic, or on Scourge. She says that she loves you, but in truth, she is merely deluding herself into thinking that. I have succeeded in stopping you, but alas you have also, in a way, won. I have become that powerful figure on which Fiona can depend. She will no doubt latch onto me for protection very soon. You ruined my plan, so I am ruining yours. I cannot undo the power of the mind control devices, but I can override them. For example, I could turn Sally into a squirrel again, then hypnotize her into thinking and acting just as she did before, and none would be the wiser. But first, I have a pest to eradicate. So long, Hypon." Tiffany monologed, before firing a black orb at Hypon. It sucked him in, his form distorting as it did so, and then shrank away to nothing.

"By the Walkers..." Nicole muttered, shocked by what she had just seen.

1412111121221111112111111111121111211112.content:
"The wound is not fatal." Tiffany said. "I don't kill. It's wrong to take a life. And believe me, if I wanted to kill him, you wouldn't have a body to bury."

"Why are you doing this?" Fiona asked.

"Why!? WHY!? I'll tell you why! for two years, you ran off with that green prick and let him walk all over you. But then he tried to kill you, and I took the hit for you. It would have killed me had Sonic not recharged me with the Chaos Emeralds. After that, you came back with us, and you told me that you wanted to stay single until the whole Scourge thing was just a distant memory, but then you'd give me a chance." Tiffany stated.

"I know all of that!" Fiona cried.

"But you never gave me that chance. When you showed up in my lab a couple of days ago, I thought you'd come for that. But no, you were there to steal my stuff and turn me into a girl. OK, I then found out that you'd become a lesbian, so maybe you'd genderbent me for that reason. But no, then that guy showed up, you seemed to forget what you were trying to do, that being turn the population of Mobius into vixen slaves, and started fawning over your new boyfriend and occasionally capturing and brainwashing someone. Then you started pushing me away because I was trying to make sure you were safe. Excuse me for thinking that a lesbian suddenly going straight when none of the slaves who have the same personality were doing that was weird. Especially when everything seemed to benefit him rather than you. Excuse me for trying to protect someone I care about! Someone I love! Someone I've always loved! Someone I turned into a girl for! Someone who I took an Anarchy blast to the face for!" Tiffany screamed, beginning to cry.

1412111121221111112111111111121111211112.content:
The two glared at the blue vixen standing in the doorway, who blushed and looked away.

"Sorry!" She squealed, before running out. She sprinted down on the stairs, and went over to sit by Tiffany and Amelia. "I just walked in on Mistress and Ruby getting 'friendly' with each other." She giggled.

"What? You mean after everything I've done for Mistress, she still ignores me?" Tiffany groaned.

"Oh, sorry, didn't know it was still a touchy subject." Sapphire said, embarrassed.

"It's OK... waitasec! This doesn't make any goddamn sense!" Tiffany gasped.

"Why?" Sapphire and Amelia asked in unison.

"Well, first off, I heard Mistress saying that she was going to turn Ruby back to normal. But we're lesbians. We all like girls, right?"

"Yeah. I can't wait till we capture Sally." Sapphire said.

"Agreed, we've decided to have a threesome." Amelia confirmed.

"Well, we have Mistress's personality. So she must be a lesbian too. So why is she going for someone who is going to be a male soon? Second point: I haven't trusted Ruby from the beginning. As Hypon, all she wanted with Mistress was to get into her pants. She doesn't care that we've all had our free wills removed. That means she's doing all this to get close to Mistress."

"You mean like all those things you did to get close to Mistress?" Amelia asked.

"You mean like all those things you did to get close to me when I was Sonic?" Sapphire asked.

"Touche." Both said.

"Anyway," Tiffany went on. "Ruby is the only one of us who isn't under mind control. She can do whatever the hell she likes, so long as Mistress doesn't notice. Who says she's not manipulating her?"

"I find that a little hard to believe. Ruby seems to really love Mistress." Amelia stated.

"Fair enough. Point three: Mistress is planning to make Ruby her king. Kings have more power than queens. Some queens in history never married, just to avoid losing their power to a man. Elizabeth I of Albion, for example. Due to the sexism in the royal system, a queen who has a king becomes little more than a trophy wife,someone to produce offspring. Sally will confirm this when we catch her." Tiffany exposited. "Don't you find it weird that Fiona's doing all this for power, and yet she seems willing to hand it all over to some guy once she gets it, especially when she's turning every other guy into a girl?"

"Now that you mention it, it is a bit odd." Sapphire admitted.

"Right. Point the fourth: Look at the slave allocation. We all belong to Mistress, but it just so happens that Ruby's slaves are the ones that have a ray gun and an earthquake machine disguised as muscial instruments. In other words, the only long range fighters. The ones who could take all of us out fairly easily."

"It was an accident with the mind control device." Amelia said.

"You're talking to the girl who made it. It can't do that. It works exclusively for one person and one person alone: Mistress. Unless the override was pressed, Mandy and Sarah would have become Mistress' slaves instead of Ruby's. And I built that thing so that someone would have to press the override on purpose. Do you honestly think I'd leave something that useful lying around, so someone like Robotnik or Scourge could steal it?" Tiffany finished.

"You're right." Sapphire and Amelia said at once.

"I don't know much about Hypon before he became Ruby, and I don't know if he was the sort to do this, or whether changing gender and species scrambled his brain, but I think Ruby took Mandy and Sarah for herself on purpose, and I think Mistress is in danger."

"How much danger?" Amelia asked.

"From where I stand, it's looking like Scourge all over again." Tiffany growled.

"Oh... shit." Sapphire cursed. "Do you have a plan?"

"Yes, but we need Sally and Nicole." Tiffany said.

1412111121221111112111111111121111211112.content:
Sapphire quickly ran in and out of Fiona's room, bringing the mind control device with her.

"Phase one is complete: We have the ray. Now we need to capture Sally." Tiffany said, taking the device and leading the two hedgehogs-turned foxes to the Tornado. Sapphire took her usual spot on the wing (Some things never change), and Amelia jumped into the seat behind Tiffany. The plane took off, and headed for Knothole.

"Tiff? How are you going to brainwash Nicole? She's a computer" Amelia asked.

"I made an adapter for the device, so that it will work on AIs. It turns them into lovely, foxy fembots. I'd show you, but I'd probably drop it. It has the wonderful bonus of working as a roboticizer." Tiffany explained.

"Cool." Amelia complimented.

It wasn't long before they arrived, and Sapphire jumped off the plane, helped Tiffany and Amelia out, and let them towards Sally's hut.

Inside, the squirrel was fast asleep after a tough mission, made tougher by Sonic's disappearance. Tiffany snuck up to her, and fired the ray, waking Sally, but making her another mindless slave of Fiona.

"Where is Mistress?" Sally asked tiredly.

"At base, and in danger if my theory is true. We need your help to save her." Tiffany replied. "One more thing, though."

Tiffany fired the ray again, and, in a flash, Sally's body shifted until she looked almost identical to Fiona.

"I feel great." Sally giggled, wrapping her arms around Sapphire a hug which the blue vixen reciprocated, and Amelia joined in. Tiffany noticed Nicole's handheld attached to Sally's boot, reached down, and took it off, activating it, causing Nicole's avatar to appear in the room. She recoiled at the sight of the three multicoloured Fiona lookalikes snuggling in her best friend's room, and again at the yellow, twin-tailed Fiona pointing some kind of device at her.

"What is going on?" The AI lynx asked in a panicked tone.

"Oh, nothing." Tiffany giggled, firing the ray. Nicole's avatar became a vixen, solidified, and, below the skin and fur, became mechanical, though this couldn't be seen from the surface. After that, Sally and Nicole were seated on the bed, and Tiffany explained the situation. Sally confirmed that if Hypon became king, Fiona would lose all of her power.

"I told you so." Tiffany said, hands on hips, to her two older friends.

"Now what?" Nicole asked. "How do we save Mistress?"

1412111121221111112111111111121111211112.content:
"It's just"....Hypon started to say, as he suddenly saw Fiona turn the beam onto him.

"What are you doing Fi?!" He looked at her with a look of concern and confusion.

Fiona scoffed. "It took me this long.... to finally realize this isn't what I wanted. Everything I wanted to avoid from Scourge... the whole reason I started this venture." She laughed, "Sorry babe, but I want the power, not a partner."

"What, but I thought w-We're married?!" Hypon replied to her with a slight bit of panic"

"After what we did for that whole time. Do you have any idea how little that means to me now.... Call it Emotions, or getting back in the spirit. Perhaps it was something I'll never know. But you are not my equal." She says as she fires the mind ray at him, making him obedient to her. Now here is what I'm going to do. You seemed to like Bimbo's so much.... I might as well let you become one." She smiled and fired at him again.

Hypon looked in fear as his entire world turned upside down, but to his surprise he still kept a conscious mind.

"What?" Fiona said to him as she approached the frozen hedgewolf. "Surprised? I would bet so. I've never once seen you at my mercy. I want to see everything that happens. I simply slowed it down. Make no mistake... when I'm done with you, you will not be able to count how many breasts you have.... In case you've forgotten. Two." Fiona fired a secondary beam at Hypon to transform him back into Ruby.

Ruby could only look in fear as she felt her mind start slipping slowly, as she waited for her fate to be revealed by her mistress. Only to feel a sudden weight on her chest as Fiona fired again.

"I figure if you're going to act like a Bimbo, you should look the part as well." Fiona fired at her again making her body do whatever she wished. "You see, you've simply become too much of a burden for me to worry about. I have all this power. I have have all the love I want, and you.... You restrict that." She schemed in front of her, massaging her breasts until she started lactating, then aimed her breasts up towards Ruby's face. "Drink. Drink your own milk. Tell me, how does it taste?"

"Very good Mistress...." Ruby stammered after finishing.

"Good, because as of this moment. I'm done with you. Ruby was a mistake, I let myself get too attached, and now it's time to set that straight. Your name is no longer Ruby. From this moment on, you will forget you ever were Ruby, or ANYTHING about your past life as a male. You are now "Slut" Do you understand me.... Slut"

"Yes I do Mistress. Like I like it. It fits me" She said with draining intellect. "Perfect, and what do you remember? About everything before this"

Slut thought for a second, puzzled, then spoke up. "I drank my tit milk! It was yummy".

Fiona smiled and fired one more button. "Good. Even though you are nothing but a mindless Bimbo.... I don't want to take the risk of you crawling your way back up. She snaps her fingers and two of her other slaves come to her.

"Take her to Robotropolis. Leave her to Robotnik. She's no longer able to help us." She holds up her gun and smiles "All Slut is now is a cock hungry cum starved whore... who I'm sure will make a very pleasurable peace offering to the Doctor or one of his many underlings. Take her away. And if she makes any attempts to escape Kill her."

The two slaves leave with the bimbo hedgefox, as Fiona walks off triumphantly. "Time to take control again."

Tiffany was sleeping, when a voice echoed in her mind.

"Chosen One." It said. "The time for you to save us draws near."

"I am Tikal." She replied. "Aurora's messenger. She sent me to save her chosen one, but you must make a choice. Return to you old life, as you were, or get revenge on the one who destroyed your life."

"I want revenge on this whoever it was." TIffany said, after a while. A burst of light shone from Tiffany's position, and everything came back to her. She transformed from sweet-hearted, brainwashed princess hedgewolf, to a powerfully-built warrior vixen, clad in heavy-duty black combat gear. Her age went from 18 to 21, and she snarled, as the seven Super Emeralds, glowing brilliantly in the night, appeared around her.

"Done." Tikal said, happiness in her voice.

"Thanks." Tiffany said, standing up, and heading out of the room.

1412111121221111112111111111121111211112.content:
The diadem that was about to be placed on Tiffany's head levitated, surrounded by blue light, into the air, and shattered, as Silver the Hedgehog appeared in front of them.

"People of Mobius. I have come here today to tell you something. Because you all got turned into females, the Mobian race goes extinct. And it's all because of Hypon." He said.

"What?" Fiona gasped. Then seven Time Stones appeared around Silver, and he transformed into his Super form.

"Fiona, you never loved Hypon. You were brainwashed. Tiffany was never your daughter. She was nearly the same age as you, and your lover. Hypon couldn't handle that because he was a selfish bastard, and altered you, both mentally and physically in Tiffany's case, to suit his desires. But now, your stolen memories and forms, I return to you!"

Silver unleashed a powerful shockwave of Chaos Energy, and Fiona and Tiffany reverted to their pre-Hypon/Ruby states.

"Fiona, what happened?" TIffany groaned, standing up. "Why am I dressed like some kind of sappy princess from a kids' movie? And why is my outfit so tight. It feels like it was made for someone three or so years younger than me."

"I don't know... And why the hell am I in a dress? Where's my normal outfit?" Fiona shouted angrily.

"Now, to put things back on track." Super Silver said, ignoring the exchange. "CHRONOS CONTROL!"

Another shockwave of energy went off, and time began to reverse, dragged all the way back to the point before Tiffany tried to kill Ruby. Silver found himself in Ruby's room, and he picked the vixen up, lifting her out of the room with his powers.

"What are you doing?" She asked.

"Fixing several problems. First being you." Super Silver growled, opening a portal to the Void and throwing Ruby in, sealing her inside. If she ever left, she would turn into crystal.

"Silver?" Came the voice of Tiffany. He turned around to see her holding her transformation ray in one hand, and a revolver in the other. "Where's Ruby?"

"She's gone." Super Silver replied. Tiffany grinned, and pointed the ray at Silver.

"Chosen one." He said, approaching Tiffany. "Since I am a curteous god, I will inform you that my merger with Iblis is going to occur in about ten minutes. The time has come for you to face us, Miles Prower."

"Who's Miles Prower?" Tiffany asked. The hedgehog recoiled.

"Uh, you are. You know, fate of the multiverse, I'm going to eat it, me, Mephiles, you, Tails, big battle, Sonic and Knuckles help you, remember?" He asked.

"Uh, no?" Tiffany replied.

"Your uncle Merlin didn't tell you?" Mephiles questioned. "He didn't prepare you at all?"

"I don't have an Uncle Merlin." Tiffany countered.

"Am I even in the right universe... yes, definitely the Prime Zone." Mephiles mused. "OK, let me get this straight, something must have happened to you, turned you into an eight-year old girl, made you forget everything about yourself. Whoever did it must be some kind of evil mastermind. As for our conflict, it seems that their selfish designs have brought about the end of your world. I shall be sure to thank them."

In a flash of light, Mephiles vanished, and Solaris appeared in the darkening sky. Reality tore itself apart at the seams, pouring into the sun god's body, until there was nothing left.

Solaris floated in the dark void, and raised his hand. In it, the form of a universe began to take shape.

"Now, to begin anew." He chuckled.

And so, the universe as we know it ended, all because one selfish wolf-turned-vixen couldn't let Tiffany and Fiona be a couple. Kind of a shitty ending, really, but no chosen one means no-one to save the universe. Aurora really should have stepped in and stopped it, but she didn't. Kind of a failure on her part. Tails could have stopped Solaris, even as Tiffany, but being kicked back 3 years and having her memory re-written left her unable to stop it. But hey, at least Ruby got what she wanted, and that's all that matters, right?

Right?

Right?

info.description:
Fiona sneaks into Tails lab to get inventions that Tails has made.And use these to create a army of Vixens at her command.

Rules

1.Fiona can take up to limit of two inventions.Fiona can take more as she make Tails into a Vixen and so on.

2.No random own characters it will be deleted.You can add OCS only if they are not hampering the flow of the story.

3.If Fiona gains a brain washing device. Fiona will brain wash the said victim into thinking and acting the same way she does.

4.Brain washing can be undone if you want,but Tails right now does not have a counter for said device.

5.When Fiona turn said Victim into a her slave she will gave them a pair of her clothes and make them Vixens (female foxes).

6.Sex is allowed but if its detailed put a warning

7.No Eggman you can mention him but don't add him to the story

8.Do not end the story.if I see a ending I will count it as a time skip and continue it from there.
a.Any endings that already exist in the story where there before this rule was added.
